name: Kitty Girl Fly - Pre-Alpha
description:
Kitty Girl Fly is the new arcade game being developed by Parallax Visions. The game features space-bending graphics as you navigate your character through wave after wave of monsters shooting deadly balls of energy. Accumulate points by destroying the monsters with your feline laser powers, but be careful: you've only got 9 lives and then it's GAME OVER. Players can share their high score through the series of tubes to see how they rank in the world. Experience psychedelia like never before, and defeat the Barbarous Brain Beasts!

All images and videos shown are not final


4 Stage Arcade Mode
Survival Mode
Online Leaderboards
Achievements
Controller/Arcade Stick Support
PC Mac and Linux Support

Wanna help us make Kitty Girl Fly better? Fill out our feedback survey!
